Import locally downloaded assessment file

Source: R/get_raw_assessment.R
import_local_assessment.Rd

Imports an assessment data file that was manually downloaded from the Maryland Report Card website.

Usage

import_local_assessment(
  file_path,
  end_year,
  data_type = c("proficiency", "participation")
)

Arguments

file_path

Path to the Excel or CSV file

end_year

School year end (e.g., 2024 for 2023-24)

data_type

Type of data: "participation" or "proficiency"

Value

Data frame with assessment results

Details

Use this function when you have manually downloaded assessment data from the Maryland Report Card at https://reportcard.msde.maryland.gov.

For proficiency data, navigate to: Graphs > Data Downloads > Academic Achievement or Assessment Results

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Import a manually downloaded file
assess_data <- import_local_assessment(
  file_path = "~/Downloads/MCAP_ELA_2024.xlsx",
  end_year = 2024,
  data_type = "proficiency"
)
} # }
